name: Puzzle Boy
description: Everybody's run into Kwirks-like when your shoe laces got tied together, or socks never matched...and behind it all was the original-Kwirk himself.But now, Kwirk, the Chilled Tomato, is in a bit of a stew. Somebody has set a trap for his main squeeze, Tammy. And Kwirk's the only truckin' Tomato with a chance to rescue her from this puzzling predicament.
